metadata.title: CVE-2018-5251 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In libming 0.4.8, there is an integer signedness error vulnerability (leftshift of a negative value) in the readSBits function (util/read.c). Remoteattackers can leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service viaa crafted swf file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
